TextSender for Pebble Beta

Changelog:

2.0.0-35

  • Hopefully fixed issue with "Action" not showing up in notification menu
  • As a workaround in order to make "Action" appear, TextSender for Pebble will clear Pebble's notification sources whenever an app with actionable notifications is added. This means that TextSender will occasionally reset the "Muted" state for certain apps. Apps which you previously had muted will become unmuted occasionally. TextSender will attempt to do this as little as possible.
  • Actionable notifications should be functional. Please read the release notes for 2.0.0-1 and 2.0.0-2 before proceeding.

2.0.0-24

  • Hopefully fixed issue with "Action" not showing up in notification menu
  • Actionable notifications should be functional. Please read the release notes for 2.0.0-1 and 2.0.0-2 before proceeding.

2.0.0-16

  • Stability issues
  • Actionable notifications should be functional. Please read the release notes for 2.0.0-1 and 2.0.0-2 before proceeding.

2.0.0-4

  • Fixed issues with sending texts
  • Fixed duplicate contact numbers

2.0.0-2

  • I think I fixed the crash after installing the new beta version
  • There are a few things you should note about the new notification actions:
    • Pebble may take a long time to launch or freeze up after installing the new beta update. This is somewhat expected, it should work properly after that
    • The "Action" option in the notification menu on your Pebble may not disappear after uninstall, although it will not be functional, and may crash your phone app if the tweak is not installed. The "Action" option may remain even if you remove the tweak or if you restore your phone.

2.0.0-1

  • Reply to actionable notifications with your Pebble! To perform a notification action, choose "Action" from the notifications menu. If a notification doesn't have any actions, or those actions would require you to unlock your phone, only a "Dismiss" action will be shown. You may only be able to perform an action on a notification one time. Please, please, give me any feedback or let me know of any issues that you find.
  • Enables compatibility with email actions
  • Fixed a bug where contact with multiple phone numbers wouldn't have all of the phone numbers displayed

1.1.0-4

  • Updated for compatibility for Pebble version 3.14 (I think)

1.0.1-1

  • Updated the beta version number
  • Updated the package identifier of the beta to differentiate from the release

1.0.0-336

  • Changed the way that the Pebble app communicates with the messaging app
  • Fix a bug when a user doesn't have any recent contacts
  • Localize the "Sending..." dialog when replying

1.0.0-315

  • Attempt at fixing a crash in "Send Text" app introduced in 1.0.0-314
  • Attempting to fix an issue sending to certain contacts in "Send Text" app

1.0.0-314

  • DO NOT UPDATE: May cause crashes with "Send Text" app
  • Attempting to fix an issue sending to certain contacts in "Send Text" app

1.0.0-311

  • A potential fix for failure to send using the "Send Text" app
  • Fixes 'nil class argument' bug

1.0.0-298

  • Attempt at fixing a crash when searching a contact with the "TextSender" app

1.0.0-293

  • Support for Pebble's "Send Text" app

1.0.0-278

  • Support for Pebble 3.12
